description.value:
Your healing energies linger after you cast, providing continual benefits.

An ally that recovers Hit Points from your @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Lay on Hands]{Lay on Hands} gains 10 temporary Hit Points at the start of their turn during each of the next 10 rounds. This effect ends if the ally is knocked @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Unconscious]{Unconscious}.

@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Touch]{Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Touch}
